name: Pokemon Showdown Electric Theme
description: A custom skin for Pok√©mon Showdown with an Electric theme. Images fitted for a 1366:768 screen. No promises if it works for other screen sizes/resolutions.
additional_info:
16/2 2014 - Background in battles made easier to read, increased readability for a few boxes, weather now have their backgrounds added back in. Pseudoweather is Trick room, Magic room, Wonder room etc...

17/2 2014 - Replays have gotten a similar rework to the rest of the site. There's no longer a "light" option for replay screen however.

21/2 2014 - The PP is now back, it had gone on vacation.

2/8 2014 - The Weakness command is visible and easier to read
